title: Mediterranean-style Studio Gem in Prestigious Burlingame!
posting_body: Welcome Home to Classic Peninsula Living at La Solana!
A charming Mediterranean-style apartment community in the heart of Burlingame.
Choose from light-filled apartments, featuring ample storage, stylish built-ins, and beautifully tiled bathrooms.
On-site amenities include laundry facilities, a bike storage area and convenient parking.
La Solana is located directly between the two main avenues of Burlingame--Broadway Avenue and stylish Burlingame Avenue.
There you will find a wide variety of fine restaurants, eclectic shopping and entertainment options.
La Solana is easily accessible to Highway 101, Samtrans bus service, and Caltrain
